mapper.select: select COUNT(DISTINCT user_id) AS user_count from access_stats
SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT user_id) AS user_count FROM access_stats WHERE access_time >= #{today} AND access_time < DATE_ADD(#{today}, INTERVAL 1 DAY)
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO daily_activity (stats_date, dau, new_user_count, dormant_user_count, returning_user_count, withdrawn_user_count) VALUES (#{today}, #{DAU}, #{newUserCount}, #{dormantUserCount}, #{returningUserCount}, #{withdrawnUserCount})
